title: Balduran's Giantslayer
content: Balduran's Giantslayer Legendary 5~15 Damage 2d6 +3 Slashing Giantslayer: On a hit, double the damage from your Strength Modifier. This weapon grants you Advantage on Attack Rolls against Large, Huge, or Gargantuan creatures. Weapon Enchantment +3 Giant FormClass Actions Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Wielded by Balduran, the founder of Baldur's Gate and friend to guardian dragon, a great glittering wyrm called Ansur.
